--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> 
wrote:
> Everyone:
> 
> There have been a large number of job-related e-mails coming into 
this 
> list. I am routinely removing the poster and deleting the e-mail. 
This 
> is not a job search list, either for employees or employers. If you 
want 
> to find a job, use another venue. (xp-jobs, for example)
> 
> Please stop wasting my time posting job ads, particularly if you 
are 
> only looking for candidates in one region of the world. North 
Americans, 
> by and large, do not care about jobs in India; and I imagine that's 
true 
> the other way around.
> 
> Thank you.
> -- 
> J. B. Rainsberger,
> Diaspar Software Services
> http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
> Let's write software that people understand
